data.name: Theresa Emenike
data.review: Running a school has never been this easy, because dragging debt from parents can be quite embarassing. Thank you Studebt for making my life easier.

data.name: Kadijat Lawal
data.review: I don’t even have to bother anymore about parents running away with my money because the possibility of students getting admitted into other schools has been reduced by 99%.

data.name: Bassey Akpan
data.review: Through this platform, I’ve been able to retrieve 80% of debts owed by runaway parents. I 10/10 recommend this platform for every school owner.

data.name: Adekuhle Ayodeji
data.review: Joining this platform has saved me from admitting debtors into my school. This platform has made school business a lot beter for me and my teachers.
